title: Insurance division
context: [ARTICLE 2D] MARKET CONDUCT [ยง431:2D-101] Legislative intent. The purpose of this article is to establish a framework for insurance division market conduct actions, including: (1) Processes and systems for identifying, assessing, and prioritizing market conduct problems that have a substantial adverse impact on consumers, policyholders, and claimants; (2) Market conduct actions by the commissioner to substantiate those market conduct problems and a means to remedy significant market conduct problems; and (3) Procedures to communicate and coordinate market conduct actions among states to foster the most efficient and effective use of resources.
